price: Na walimtaka awape wageni wake. Tukayapofua macho yao, na tukawaambia: Onjeni basi adhabu na maonyo yangu!
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيۡفِهِۦ فَطَمَسۡنَآ أَعۡيُنَهُمۡ فَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
footnotes: Wakamtaka awape wageni wake wawatende fiili yao, tukayafuta macho yao kuwa ni malipo kwa hilo walilo litaka. Basi waambie kwa kuwakejeli: Igugumieni adhabu yangu, na maonyo yangu!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad rāwadūhu ʿan ḍayfihi faṭamasnā aʿyunahum fadhūqū ʿadhābī wanudhuri
